titles.title: A resolution congratulating the members of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc. for 100 years of service to communities throughout the United States and the world, and commending Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc. for its promotion of sisterhood, scholarship, and service.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
1/30/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc., for 100 years of service to communities throughout the United States and the world.
Commends it for its promotion of sisterhood, scholarship, and service.
